name: Crash on Planet X
description:
This is a one screen game in which you have to survive as long as you can while aliens attack you after you've crashed on their planet. Enemy corpses remain on the battlefield when you kill them and block your path, but they can be destroyed. 

In order to play you'll need a controller, the controls are:

R1/RB for shooting, Left stick to move, Right stick to aim

This is just a prototype and there are some bugs (for example in some occasions you might be able to go inside an obstacle and you'll become immortal) so please be kind when judging. If you have any feedback leave it in the comments, it will be really appreciated :)
